name: Draw Themselves (v3.0)
description:
Draw Themselves! is a toy, in top view.

You are in a simulation space where you can spawn or destroy entities. Entitites have self simple AI and you can't control them, you are only able to spawn/destroy them or configure their pattern and stats. All entities will automaticly attack others that are different from themselves. Make them fight or just enjoy the visual, of them raoming around. You can choose 4 different types of entities:

  • Blue: Shoot straight bullets and moves in circle
  • Red: Shoot guided missiles and moves in increments of 45 degrees
  • Green: Run away from danger, spray toxic gaz behind him and moves in circle
  • Yellow: Run away from danger, leaves mines behind him and moves in increments of 45 degrees

You are able to change the time scale to go faster, slower or stop time, to place them more easily, before letting the war begin or just speed up the process, seing which entities will dominate with time. Feel free to create the most epic battles or just watch these little entities live together!

_______________________________________________________________

VICTORY CONDITIONS:

  • None, it's not a game but a toy, you can't win or loose, there is no goal, just play for fun as long as you want! Enjoy!

TIPS:

  • By spawning only one type of entities, you can create nice colored animated background and change time scale to create various art pieces! ;)

_______________________________________________________________

CONTROLS (only mouse/keypad):

  • LeftClick on any menus, to interact with them
  • LeftClick to spawn an entity:
  • then -> LeftClick to orientate and activate it
  • or -> RightClick to cancel
  • RightClick on an entity to destroy it

_______________________________________________________________

Made by Bédu Louis, student in Game Design at ICAN, Paris, in several weeks, when doing my second year of studies!

This project is a succession of the "Draw Themselves (Background_Version)" turned into a game, or at least a toy.
